entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then snow. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:10 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
